special_abilities.desc: The scout has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.
special_abilities.name: Keen Hearing and Sight

actions.desc: The scout makes two melee attacks or two ranged attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.name: Shortsword

actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, ranged 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.name: Longbow
